data_source.reference: D.S.Leonard et al., Nucl. Instr. and Meth. A591 (2008) (10.1016/j.nima.2008.03.001)

sample.description: Cleaned photo-etched phosphor-bronze APD spider contacts from Vaga Industries using selected chemicals. Base material is entry 80.
sample.name: Phosphor-bronze, Vaga Industries, cleaned, photo-etched

measurement.description: For each of K, Th, and U, natural terrestrial abundance ratios were used to covert from isotopic to total elemental abundances.
